name: Scheduled maintenance on billing infrastructure
content:
On May 14th at 05:00 AM UTC we are going to perform a scheduled maintenance on our billing infrastructure. During this window (projected at 4-6 hours), project owners won't be able to successfully perform any billing related action, such as - but not limited to - plan change, credit card update, billing address update, project transfer, project deletion and account deletion.

Also, automatic plan adjustments will be delayed until the end of the maintenance.

updates.content:
POSTPONED

Our provider postponed the migration, so we are waiting for a new time window from them.

We'll create a new scheduled maintenance event here once we have more information.
